website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive batting gloves that work for either youth baseball or softball players nicely.
pros: Very soft batting gloves that allow your hand to flex naturally while handling the bat
Back of the gloves features pinholes in the material to help keep your hands cool
Just one piece in the palm, meaning seams won't cause problems with your grip
Available in five different youth size options
Works well for those just starting to play baseball or softball
cons: Only available in one color combination
Durability of the materials is a question mark

customer_reviews.title: If your lookin to purchasing for a 12 year old or early teen not a bad price for them. If for a child I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 5 year old in Teeball. The reason for x-small size ordered. When I received them they were the size made for a teenager. My wife’s able to fit them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Sim

customer_reviews.title: Quality gloves in a small size
customer_reviews.text: perfect protective batting gloves for tiny hands. One of the only batting gloves that come in XXS which is great if you have a child with very small hands who still wants batting gloves. Lasted an entire baseball season and held up very well.

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Youth Flex Batting Gloves
product_meta.description: Designed with Tri-Curve® technology, the Franklin Sports® youth Flex batting glove promises a fantastic, flexible fit for future all-stars. It features a one-piece synthetic palm that's both durable and lightweight, as well as a synthetic and spandex back of hand that won't restrict his movement.
feature_bullets: Perfect youth glove for the beginner ball player
Right Hand Throw = Left Hand Glove, Left Hand Throw = Right Hand Glove
